dialog: Honorable visitor, be welcome to my workshop.
You are greeted by Umberto Amoroso, creator and custodian of these inventions.
Here I collect experiments, chronicles, and projects spanning past and future.
Each page tells a story, each section a different challenge faced.
Enter freely: curiosity is the key that sets every gear in motion.
Let the exploration of my archives begin!
